main event: A round object with a white to reddish color was observed in Gettysburg, South Dakota on November 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared as a brilliant light, similar to a photo flash,The object was occasionally obscured by ground clouds,It traveled on a slightly curving flight path,The observation lasted for about 1 minute,It was evaluated as possibly being a meteor.
witness description: A state highway patrolman and 3 FAA controllers, all described as reliable.
